channel.title: Oats on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Oats on Cooking

item.title: Instant Pot Pressure Cooking Steel Cut Oats
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup of oats 2.5 cups of water Instructions Add everything into the Instant Pot. Put on the lid and set to high pressure for 4 minutes. Natural release for 20 minutes when the timer goes off. Notes The oats came out pretty al dente, so I want to try 10 minutes with 20 minutes natural release.
